Yoroshiku onegai shimasu. Your sensei is from Wakayama, eh? Ever heard
of Tomisaburo Wakayama?

PG

--- In samuraihistory@yahoogroups.com, "Sharon" <hayakawa@j...> wrote:
> Hi. I found the Samurai pages through my Sensei's web page link, and 
> before this, I didn't know people studied the Samurai and Japanese 
> history with such enthusiasm. It's an eye opener for me. :-) Good to 
> have one's eyes opened. 
> My name is Sharon Hayakawa, aka Shuri Hayakawa. I live in Missouri, 
> USA. My Sensei is Doshu Shiro Shintaku from Wakayama Japan. 
> Before studying with him, I studied with Seiyu Oyata. About 17 years 
> or so. 
> Hajimemashite.
